Package org.ow2.chameleon.rose.api

Interface Summary
InCustomizer  
OutCustomizer  
 

Class Summary
InConnection A InConnection allows to import all services matching a given filter with all available ImporterService dynamically.
InConnection.InBuilder Convenient Builder for the creation of a InConnection.
Instance Useful builder that allows for the instantiation of component, such as the ones providing ExporterService, ImporterService as well as service discovery and publication facilities.
Instance.InstanceBuilder  
Machine The meat of RoSe.
Machine.MachineBuilder Builder to create a RoSeMachine.
OutConnection A OutConnection allows to export all services matching a given filter with all available ExporterService dynamically.
OutConnection.OutBuilder Convenient Builder for the creation of a OutConnection.
